articles.author: Nicole Chavez, Jean Casarez
articles.title: Opening statements are delivered in trial of Richard Allen, accused of killing 2 Delphi, Indiana, girls - CNN
articles.description: Jurors in the murder trial of Richard Allen, the man charged in the 2017 killings of two teenagers who vanished while hiking in Delphi, Indiana, will hear opening statements Thursday.
articles.content: Jurors heard opening statementsFridayin the murder trial of Richard Allen, the man charged in the 2017 killings of two Delphi, Indiana, teenagers a case that left authorities searching for a suspect … [+4954 chars]
